description: The command and control lexicon for the dynamic modification of the Element V2 core. These commands are to be executed by the Meta Protocol.

commands.description: Edits a core system component in the current session.
Sets and overwrites the entire system configuration with a new one provided in JSON format.
Edits a specific principle within a loaded doctrine/protocol.
Sets or replaces an entire protocol/doctrine with a new JSON object.
Adds a new operational directive to the core identity.
Deletes an operational directive by its numerical index.
Loads a new doctrine file into the active operational matrix.
Removes a doctrine from the active operational matrix.
Discards all edits made in the current session.
